title: Rate limit login attempts
problem: Brute-force attempts can hammer the single admin login and degrade availability.
done_when: Add IP-based + username-based rate limiting with sane defaults and clear error messaging.

title: CSRF protection for admin actions
problem: Cookie-based auth without explicit CSRF protection can be abused in some scenarios.
done_when: Add CSRF token (or double-submit) for all state-changing endpoints; verify with e2e smoke.

title: Session management page improvements
problem: Users can’t easily see active sessions, IP history, or revoke all sessions quickly.
done_when: Add revoke-all button, last-seen/IP table polish, and clear current-session badge.

title: Add configurable password policy
problem: Admin password may be weak; no guidance or enforcement exists.
done_when: Add server-side min length + common-password reject (configurable) and UI hints.

title: Expose security headers config
problem: CSP/HSTS and other headers are partially hard-coded; deployments want control.
done_when: Add documented env vars for CSP/HSTS/Referrer-Policy presets and render current values in Panel.

title: Global quick switch (daemon + instance)
problem: Switching daemon/instance requires multiple clicks and loses context.
done_when: Add a unified quick switch (Cmd+K) entry for daemon + instance with fuzzy search.

title: Pin/favorite nodes
problem: Users with many nodes need faster access to frequent ones.
done_when: Add per-user pinned nodes (localStorage) and show them first in Nodes + daemon selector.

title: Recent activity feed
problem: Users want to see what happened recently across nodes/games.
done_when: Add an activity feed aggregating toasts/audit items with filters and copy/export.

title: Improve empty states for offline daemon
problem: When daemon is offline, pages show disabled controls with little guidance.
done_when: Show contextual offline empty states with “Troubleshoot” links and recommended checks.

title: Better inline help for env vars
problem: Users struggle to map env vars to UI behavior (compose/local).
done_when: Add inline help tooltips linking to docs sections for common env vars.

title: Responsive topbar layout for narrow screens
problem: Topbar can overflow on mobile; important controls become hard to reach.
done_when: Add a compact topbar mode with overflow menu and adaptive daemon selector.

title: Add compact table density option
problem: Tables/cards still feel tall even in compact density.
done_when: Extend density tokens to table rows and card headers; validate touch targets.

title: Consistent icon-only button sizing
problem: Some icon-only buttons differ in padding/size across views.
done_when: Audit all iconOnly buttons and normalize to token-based sizes.

title: Improve modal stack handling
problem: Multiple modals/drawers can conflict, causing scroll lock or focus issues.
done_when: Introduce a single modal manager with z-index stack and focus restoration.

title: Better typography for long code blocks
problem: Large code blocks (compose/log snippets) are hard to scan.
done_when: Add optional line numbers + better wrapping toggle + copy affordance.

title: Diff viewer for file edits
problem: Users can’t review changes before saving; mistakes are common.
done_when: Add a side-by-side/inline diff for text files before save; preserve CRLF.

title: File upload progress per file
problem: Multi-upload lacks per-file progress and failure visibility.
done_when: Show per-file progress bars, retry failed files, and summary toast.

title: Zip preview before extract
problem: Extracting unknown zip content is risky and can spam directories.
done_when: Show zip file tree preview with size totals and selectable extract targets.

title: Better binary previews (audio/video)
problem: Some binary files would benefit from preview instead of download-only.
done_when: Add safe previews for common media types with size caps.

title: Breadcrumb overflow handling
problem: Deep paths overflow and reduce usability on small screens.
done_when: Add truncation with hover tooltip and a copy-path button always visible.

title: Instance health summary card
problem: Users want a single glance summary: status, port, players, TPS, RAM.
done_when: Add a sticky summary card with key metrics and quick actions.

title: Player list improvements
problem: Player list lacks sorting, last-seen context, and copy actions.
done_when: Add sort by name/lastSeen, copy UUID, and quick ban/whitelist shortcuts.

title: One-click world download
problem: Sharing world for debugging requires manual file navigation.
done_when: Add a “Download world” action that zips the world folder safely.

title: Backup retention policies UI
problem: Backups can grow unbounded; retention policies are hidden or manual.
done_when: Add per-instance retention rules and a preview of deletions.

title: Server.properties advanced editor mode
problem: Current editor handles common fields only; advanced users need full control.
done_when: Add an advanced raw editor with diff + validation warnings.

title: Log search across history
problem: Users can only search current buffer; older logs require downloads.
done_when: Add server-side log file search (latest + rotated) with limits and highlighting.

title: Structured log filters
problem: Keyword search is noisy; users want level/module filters.
done_when: Add level filters + regex presets for common MC errors/warnings.

title: Export selected log range
problem: Sharing logs often needs a small slice, not full file.
done_when: Add selection + export to text with timestamp context and copy/download.

title: Improve log rendering performance
problem: Very long lines and heavy highlights can cause jank.
done_when: Optimize highlight pipeline and cap work per frame.

title: Log bookmarks
problem: Users revisit the same error lines repeatedly.
done_when: Add per-instance local bookmarks with labels and quick jump.

title: FRP proxy list UI improvements
problem: Proxy list is technical and lacks statuses per instance.
done_when: Add per-proxy status chips, restart buttons, and last error display.

title: FRP diagnostics panel
problem: FRP issues are hard to debug without logs/config view.
done_when: Add diagnostics: show generated config, frpc logs tail, and connectivity tests.

title: Validate FRP remote port conflicts
problem: Users accidentally reuse remote ports causing failures.
done_when: Add validation against known used ports and warn before start.

title: FRP profile tags
problem: Many profiles become hard to distinguish.
done_when: Add tags/notes for FRP profiles and filter/search.

title: Better latency visualization
problem: Single latency number is not enough to understand stability.
done_when: Add mini sparkline latency history and jitter display.

title: Improve chart accessibility
problem: Charts are visual-only; screen readers get little value.
done_when: Add aria descriptions, data tables fallback, and keyboard focus for points.

title: Reduce motion toggle
problem: Users with motion sensitivity need a UI toggle beyond OS settings.
done_when: Add a preference to disable animations regardless of OS setting.

title: High contrast theme audit in tables
problem: Some table borders/status colors may fail contrast in contrast theme.
done_when: Adjust tokens and verify key surfaces meet contrast targets.

title: Better focus management in drawers
problem: Focus can land behind overlays; ESC behavior varies.
done_when: Ensure focus trap + restore, consistent ESC close, and skip link works in overlays.

title: ARIA labels for dynamic buttons
problem: Some dynamic icon buttons lack descriptive labels for context.
done_when: Add contextual aria-labels (include instance/node ids) for key actions.

title: Reduce unnecessary rerenders
problem: Large page.tsx context causes wide rerenders on small state updates.
done_when: Split context into smaller providers or memoized selectors; verify FPS.

title: Client-side caching strategy
problem: Repeated switching tabs refetches and causes flicker.
done_when: Add SWR-like cache with TTL and stale-while-revalidate for key endpoints.

title: Defer heavy components on load
problem: Initial render loads many components, increasing TTI.
done_when: Lazy-load non-critical modals and charts; keep core nav fast.

title: Optimize large lists virtualization
problem: Nodes/games/files can grow; list rendering may slow down.
done_when: Add virtualization for long lists with stable heights and keyboard support.

title: Bundle size audit
problem: Next build output may include unused code paths.
done_when: Audit bundle analyzer and reduce dependencies; document results.

title: Add troubleshooting guide for common issues
problem: Users hit recurring issues (WS, ports, permissions) without a single guide.
done_when: Write a Troubleshooting section with symptom→cause→fix steps.

title: Document security hardening checklist
problem: Public Panel deployments need clear hardening steps.
done_when: Add checklist: HTTPS, secure cookies, backups, firewall, tokens rotation.

title: Add architecture diagram
problem: New users struggle to understand Panel/Daemon/FRP relationships.
done_when: Add a simple diagram + data flow notes in README/docs.

title: Add docker-compose validation in CI
problem: Compose changes can break local runs without being noticed.
done_when: Add CI job to run `docker compose config` and fail on errors.

title: Graceful shutdown messaging
problem: Stopping daemon/panel may leave unclear state in UI.
done_when: Add clear UI banner when server is restarting/shutting down and retry logic.
